name: Trump Space Invaders
description:
You don't need this game? Wrong. You're wrong.

Trump Space Invaders attack to White House!
Stand your ground against the Trump space invaders in a classic arcade space shooter and save America. 
Face big waves of Trump minions and bosses.

Including Phrases:
★ "I'm really rich"
★ "Thank you darling"
★ "American dream is dead"
★ "If she wasn't mydaughter"
★ "No you're finished"
★ "You're fired"
★ "Nope"
★ "Congratulations"
★ "Get out of here"
★ "I beat China all the time"
★ "Fantastic"
★ "I run, I win"
★ ... and more! 

Trump Space Invaders must have every Trump fan or hater.

So get started and make America great again.
